channel.title: Posts on Chance's Sketchpad
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Chance's Sketchpad

item.title: Week11 - networking and communications
item.description: design, build, and connect wired or wireless node(s) with network or bus addresses and a local interface

item.title: Week10 - output devices
item.description: output devices, add an output device to a microcontroller board you’ve designed, and program it to do something

item.title: Week9 - input devices
item.description: input devices, measure something: add a sensor to a microcontroller board that you have designed and read it

item.title: Week8 - computer-controlled machining
item.description: input devices, measure something: add a sensor to a microcontroller board that you have designed and read it

item.title: Week7 - molding and casting
item.description: input devices, measure something: add a sensor to a microcontroller board that you have designed and read it

item.title: Week6 - electronics production
item.description: electronics production, make and test the development board that you designed to interact and communicate with an embedded microcontroller

item.title: Week5 - electronics design
item.description: electronics design, use an EDA tool to design a development board to interact and communicate with an embedded microcontroller

item.title: Week4 - 3D scanning and printing
item.description: 3D scanning and printing, design and 3D print an object (small, few cm3, limited by printer time) that could not be made subtractively

item.title: Week3 - embedded programming
item.description: write program for a microcontroller development board to interact (with local input &/or output devices)

item.title: Week2 - computer-controlled cutting
item.description: computer-controlled cutting, model (raster, vector, 2D, 3D, render, animate, simulate, …) a possible final project

item.title: Week1 - computer-aided design
item.description: computer-aided design, model (raster, vector, 2D, 3D, render, animate, simulate, …) a possible final project

item.title: Final Project - paper folding machine
item.description: Final project, plan to do a paper folding machine, which may be able to fold (almost) anything.
